channel.title: Cerulean Sky - Lex (remixable) [Happy Hardcore]
channel.description:
Hello! I’m happy to say that a happy hardcore album is to be released in the summer, as happy rave is one of my favorite EDM genres!
That being said; here’s the first track on it. https://soundcloud.com/lextunes/lex-cerulean-sky (What can I say? I love the sky, hence why so many of my songs are about it!)
It’s remixable as well, and if enough people remix it there is a small chance I could make a remix EP! If not then I’ll most likely add your remix onto the album (not without your permission of course.)
https://app.auxy.co/projects/nqTM1QC_aZ_cP8s3gV8PPQ==

item.title: Cerulean Sky - Lex (remixable) [Happy Hardcore]

item.description:
Awwww thank you so much!!!

HOLY CRAP, HAPPY HARDCORE IN AUXY. You’re now one of my favorite people on this Disco. I’d definitely remix it.

item.description:
I loved this song and I totally wanted to remix it… and then I realized that was your intention. I’m in!
